info.notes: make sure to run npm install in the src/simulator directory too

scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.build:osx: npm run clean:osx && electron-packager ./src/simulator "Mazda Infotainment Simulator" --asar --out=build/simulator/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=src/assets/osx/simulator.icns --app-version=0.36.8 --overwrite --ignore="build|dist" --prune=true
scripts.build:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager ./src/simulator "Mazda Infotainment Simulator" --asar --out=build/simulator/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=src/assets/win/simulator.ico --app-version=0.36.8 --overwrite --ignore="build|dist" --prune=true
